fields.notesFormatted:
The Temple Model

  • Sacred places
  • Sacred texts
  • Sacred men
  • Sincere followers
  • The arrival of Jesus singled the end of the temple model and the beginning of something

Completely New

  • Jesus predicted a new movement. Matthew 16:18
  • Jesus instituted a new covenant. Luke 22:10
  • Jesus gave new meaning to the sacred text. Matthew 5:17
  • Jesus instituted a new ethic. John 13:34-35
  • Jesus gave new meaning to Passover. Luke 22:19
